channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- Endpoint Manager Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- Endpoint Manager Mobile

item.title: CVE-2024-7612|2024-10-08T19:01:28.161Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager%20mobile
item.description: Insecure permissions in Ivanti EPMM before 12.1.0.4 allow a local authenticated attacker to access or modify sensitive configuration files without proper authorization.
